# Participate

Registration is **FREE** and open. [Click here to register](link). Please register to your earliest convenience so we can plan meals accordingly.

You are also invited to submit your abstract for your ASPB poster to be considered for a lightning talk. [Submit your abstract here](insert IPG symposium Abstract submission page).

**Deadline for abstract submission:** March 23rd, 2026.
